flavorText.text:
あしの　ツメが　はったつしている。
エサの　タマタマを　つかんで
１００キロさきの　す　まで　はこぶ。

ひろい　なわばりを　もっており
しんにゅうする　じゃまものは
てっていてきに　つつかれてしまう。

ひろい　なわばりを　とんで　みまわりを　する。
なわばりを　あらす　あいては　ようしゃ　しない。
するどい　ツメで　てっていてきに　こらしめるぞ。

ひろい　なわばりを　とんで　みまわりを　する。
なわばりを　あらす　あいては　ようしゃ　しない。
するどい　ツメで　てっていてきに　こらしめるぞ。

ありあまる　たいりょくの　もちぬしで
ひろい　なわばりを　とびまわり
とおくまで　エサを　さがしにいく。

ありあまる　たいりょくの　もちぬしで
ひろい　なわばりを　とびまわり
とおくまで　エサを　さがしにいく。

발톱이 발달해 있다.
먹이인 아라리를 잡아
100km 떨어져 있는 둥지까지 나른다.

넓은 영역을 가지고 있어
침입한 방해자는
철저하게 쪼아버린다.

넓은 영역을 날며 순찰한다.
영역을 침범하는 상대는 용서하지 않는다.
날카로운 발톱으로 철저히 혼내준다.

넓은 영역을 날며 순찰한다.
영역을 침범하는 상대는 용서하지 않는다.
날카로운 발톱으로 철저히 혼내준다.

어마어마한 체력의 소유자로
넓은 영역을 날아다니며
먼 곳까지 먹이를 찾으러 간다.

어마어마한 체력의 소유자로
넓은 영역을 날아다니며
먼 곳까지 먹이를 찾으러 간다.

擁有著超乎尋常的體力，
會在廣大的地盤裡四處飛行，
到遠處去尋找食物。

擁有著超乎尋常的體力，
會在廣大的地盤裡四處飛行，
到遠處去尋找食物。

Il survole son vaste territoire en
quête d’une proie avant de fondre
sur elle toutes griffes en avant.

Il survole son vaste territoire en
quête d’une proie avant de fondre
sur elle toutes griffes en avant.

Grâce à ses griffes très puissantes, il est capable
de transporter des Noeunoeuf vers un nid éloigné
de plus de 100 km.

Il protège son territoire avec ardeur et repousse à
coups de bec tout intrus.

Roucoups utilise une vaste surface pour son territoire.
Ce Pokémon surveille régulièrement son espace aérien.
Si quelqu’un pénètre sur son territoire, il corrige l’ennemi
sans pitié d’un coup de ses terribles serres.

Roucoups utilise une vaste surface pour son territoire.
Ce Pokémon surveille régulièrement son espace aérien.
Si quelqu’un pénètre sur son territoire, il corrige l’ennemi
sans pitié d’un coup de ses terribles serres.

Ce Pokémon est très endurant. Il survole
en permanence son territoire pour chasser.

Ce Pokémon est très endurant. Il survole
en permanence son territoire pour chasser.

Die Krallen an seinen Füßen sind sehr ausgeprägt.
Es kann sogar ein Owei zu seinem Nest
in 100 km Entfernung tragen.

Dieses Pokémon verteidigt sein abgegrenztes Areal
sorgsam gegen alle Eindringlinge.

Tauboga nennt ein großes Gebiet sein Eigen. Es fliegt
umher und kontrolliert seinen Lebensraum. Wenn jemand
sein Gebiet betritt, zeigt es keine Gnade und greift seine
Gegner mit seinen scharfen Krallen an.

Tauboga nennt ein großes Gebiet sein Eigen. Es fliegt
umher und kontrolliert seinen Lebensraum. Wenn jemand
sein Gebiet betritt, zeigt es keine Gnade und greift seine
Gegner mit seinen scharfen Krallen an.

Dieses kraftvolle Pokémon wacht unermüdlich
über sein riesiges Territorium und fliegt weite
Strecken auf der Suche nach Beute.

Dieses kraftvolle Pokémon wacht unermüdlich
über sein riesiges Territorium und fliegt weite
Strecken auf der Suche nach Beute.

Tiene unas garras desarrolladas. Puede atrapar un
Exeggcute y transportarlo desde una distancia de
casi 100 km.

Muy protector de su amplio territorio, este Pokémon
picoteará ferozmente a los intrusos.

Pidgeotto se apodera de una zona muy vasta como su
territorio y la sobrevuela para controlarla. Si alguien invade
su espacio vital, no tendrá ningún reparo en castigarlo con
sus afiladas garras.

Pidgeotto se apodera de una zona muy vasta como su
territorio y la sobrevuela para controlarla. Si alguien invade
su espacio vital, no tendrá ningún reparo en castigarlo con
sus afiladas garras.

Su extraordinaria vitalidad y resistencia le
permiten cubrir grandes distancias del territorio
que habita en busca de presas.

Su extraordinaria vitalidad y resistencia le
permiten cubrir grandes distancias del territorio
que habita en busca de presas.

Grazie ai potenti artigli può trasportare una preda
delle dimensioni di un Exeggcute per oltre 100 km.

Strenuo difensore del suo ampio territorio, becca
ferocemente ogni intruso.

Pidgeotto delimita come proprio un territorio immenso, che
difende controllandolo costantemente. Se tale territorio viene
invaso, questo Pokémon non ha pietà nel punire i nemici con
i suoi artigli affilati.

Pidgeotto delimita come proprio un territorio immenso, che
difende controllandolo costantemente. Se tale territorio viene
invaso, questo Pokémon non ha pietà nel punire i nemici con
i suoi artigli affilati.

Un Pokémon pieno di vitalità che vola
instancabile sul suo territorio in cerca di prede.

Un Pokémon pieno di vitalità che vola
instancabile sul suo territorio in cerca di prede.

Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

This POKéMON is
full of vitality.
It constantly flies around its
large territory in
search of prey.

It has outstanding
vision. However
high it flies, it is able to distin­
guish the move­
ments of its prey.

It immobilizes its
prey using well-
developed claws, then carries the
prey more than 60
miles to its nest.

It slowly flies in
a circular pat­
tern, all the while keeping a
sharp lookout for
prey.

PIDGEOTTO claims a large area as its
own territory. This POKéMON flies
around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows
no mercy in thoroughly punishing the
foe with its sharp claws.

PIDGEOTTO claims a large area as its
own territory. This POKéMON flies
around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows
no mercy in thoroughly punishing the
foe with its sharp claws.

This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its
large territory. If its living space is
violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly
punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

The claws on its feet are well developed.
It can carry prey such as an EXEGGCUTE
to its nest over 60 miles away.

Very protective of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at any intruder.

It flies over its wide territory in
search of prey, downing it
with its highly developed claws.

It flies over its wide territory in
search of prey, downing it
with its highly developed claws.

It flies over its wide territory in
search of prey, downing it
with its highly developed claws.

It has outstanding vision. However
high it flies, it is able to distinguish
the movements of its prey.

It renders its prey immobile using 
well-developed claws, then carries the
prey more than 60 miles to its nest.

search of prey, downing it
with its highly developed claws.

with its highly developed claws.

search of prey, downing it
with its highly developed claws.

The claws on its feet are well developed.
It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute
to its nest over 60 miles away.

Very protective of its sprawling territorial area,
this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory.
This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space.
If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly
punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This
Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory
is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe
with its sharp claws.

This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies
around its large territory in search of prey.

This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies
around its large territory in search of prey.

拥有超群的体力，而且
飞翔范围广，经常飞到
很远的地方寻找食物。

拥有超群的体力，而且
